Here's a comprehensive summary of the employee data:

The organization consists of 20 employees evenly distributed across four key departments: Finance, Marketing, IT, and HR, with 5 employees in each department.

Key Findings:
- Salary Distribution:
  • Range: $55,000 - $76,000
  • IT has highest salaries ($72,000-$76,000)
  • HR has lowest salaries ($55,000-$58,000)

- Experience & Performance:
  • Experience ranges from 2-9 years
  • Performance scores are strong overall (78-94)
  • Average performance score exceeds 85

- Risk Assessment:
  • Employees are categorized into Low, Medium, and High risk levels
  • Risk distribution is balanced across all departments
  • Each department maintains a diverse mix of risk profiles

The data suggests a well-structured organization with balanced departmental staffing and a wide range of experience levels. Performance metrics indicate a high-performing workforce, while the varied risk profiles demonstrate a comprehensive approach to risk management across the company.
